title: Just played my ranked games...
body:
5 - 5 Silver 2  that makes it 2 accounts with silver 2.. is loominarty or rito involved??? WHAT IS THIS SILVER 2 business

TWICE NOW!!

COULD I GET THREE??

THE DREAM??

replies.body: God this is straight up cancer, illumnati stopped being funny a long time ago. In fact, it was never even funny to begin with just appealing to the hive mind of %%%% tier humour

Goldendo 2 gets silver 2 on 2 accounts.
2+2+2=6
6/2=3
A triangle has 3 sides
Maths confirmed.
I WILL MAKE THIS HAPPEN FOR U
RIOT IS %%%%EEEED. I played my games, won 8 lost 2 - got placed in %%%%ing B4 . I was b1 near my promo - 80 points... why the %%%%kk do I get b4 for 8 wins in a row. BROKEN.

> [{quoted}](name=The Butcher King,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZBzKPWmW,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-01-24T02:55:10.372+0000)
>
> RIOT IS %%%%EEEED. I played my games, won 8 lost 2 - got placed in %%%%ing B4 . I was b1 near my promo - 80 points... why the %%%%kk do I get b4 for 8 wins in a row. BROKEN.

pretty clearly stated in the notes that your ranking will highly depend on where you were at the end of season 4, pre-season is almost non existent in the equation

Hey Molendo,

I won 4 games in s2 and skipped promos to s1.
Two wins later on 65lp in S1.

im so frustrated was b2 last season, i did my promos 8-2 i think i went well. get placed.... b2......
with a promo like that shouldnt i at least get a chance to jump bronze with a b1 or something
